attributes.action: Reopen the wards in Hartlepool general hospital
attributes.additional_details: Because they have the power to do so and we need them now more than ever.
attributes.background: Reopen the wards in Hartlepool general hospital and staff them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for the local NHS Trust.
